    • 方法详细资料

      • isNullOrEmpty

        public static boolean isNullOrEmpty(Collection<?> coll)
        Checks if the collection is null or empty (size==0).
        返回:
        true if is null or empty

      • isNotEmpty

        public static boolean isNotEmpty(Collection<?> coll)
        Checks if the collection is null or empty (size==0).
        返回:
        true if is not null and not empty

      • isNullOrEmpty

        public static boolean isNullOrEmpty(Enumeration<?> enu)
        Checks if the collection is null or empty (size==0).
        返回:
        true if is null or empty

      • isNotEmpty

        public static boolean isNotEmpty(Enumeration<?> enu)
        Checks if the collection is null or empty (size==0).
        返回:
        true if is not null and not empty

      • isNullOrEmpty

        public static boolean isNullOrEmpty(Map<?,?> map)
        Checks if the map is null or empty (size==0).
        返回:
        true if is null or empty

      • isNotEmpty

        public static boolean isNotEmpty(Map<?,?> map)
        Checks if the map is null or empty (size==0).
        返回:
        true if is not null and not empty

      • toString

        public static String toString(Collection<?> coll,
                              String delim)
        Convenience method to return a Collection as a delimited (e.g. CSV) String. E.g. useful for toString() implementations.
        参数:
        coll - the Collection to display
        delim - the delimiter to use (probably a ",")
        返回:
        the delimited String

      • toString

        public static String toString(Collection<?> coll)
        Convenience method to return a Collection as a CSV String. E.g. useful for toString() implementations.
        参数:
        coll - the Collection to display
        返回:
        the delimited String

      • checkDuplication

        public static int checkDuplication(Object[] array)
        Check Array Element Duplication.

        If it's main type element array, use like this

        checkDuplication( changeType(array) )

        返回:
        return -1 if no duplication

      • checkDuplication

        public static int checkDuplication(List<?> array)
        Check List Element Duplication
        返回:
        return -1 if no duplication

      • toArray

        public static <T> T[] toArray(Collection<T> collection,
                              Class<T> arrayType)
        Copy the given Collection into array. The Collection must contain <T> elements only.
        参数:
        collection - the Collection to copy
        返回:
        the array (null if the passed-in Collection was null)

      • toArray

        public static <T> T[] toArray(Enumeration<T> enums,
                              Class<T> arrayType)
        Copy the given Enumeration into array. The Enumeration must contain <T> elements only.
        参数:
        enums - the Enumeration to copy
        返回:
        the array (null if the passed-in Enumeration was null)

      • covertPropertiesToMap

        public static Map<String,String> covertPropertiesToMap(Properties props)
        将Properties资源转换成Map类型

                                              boolean asc)
        使用 Map按key进行排序
